title: How to Make an Ender Chest in Minecraft

steps.headline: Obtain eight obsidian blocks.
steps.description: Obsidian is created when still water touches lava. You can usually find obsidian underground. You need a diamond pickaxe in order to mine obsidian.

steps.headline: Obtain an ender pearl.
steps.description: Ender pearls are dropped when you kill Endermen. Endermen are the tall, slender, black mobs. Be careful. Endermen have strong attacks and can disappear and reappear. However, they are afraid of water. Stand in shallow water for safety.

steps.headline: Obtain a blaze rod.
steps.description: You can obtain a blaze rod by killing a blaze. Blazes are found in the Nether. To enter the nether, you need to build a nether portal.

steps.headline: Build a crafting table.
steps.description: Like most things in Minecraft, you need a crafting table to craft an Ender Chest. If you haven't already done so, gather wood from trees using your fists or an axe, and then open your crafting menu to craft wooden planks from the wood. Finally, craft a crafting table from 4 wooden planks and place it in an accessible location.

steps.headline: Craft blaze powder.
steps.description: To craft blaze powder, open the crafting table and then place the blaze rod in the center of the 3x3 crafting grid. Drag the blaze powder into your inventory.

steps.headline: Craft an Eye of Ender.
steps.description: To craft an eye of ender, open the crafting table and place the blaze powder in the center of the 3x3 crafting grid. Then place the Ender Pearl in the space to the left. Drag the Eye of Ender into your inventory.

steps.headline: Craft the Ender Chest.
steps.description: To craft an Ender Chest, open your crafting table. Place the Eye of Ender in the middle space of the 3x3 crafting grid. Place 8 blocks of obsidian in each space surrounding the Eye of Ender in the center. Drag the Ender Chest into your inventory. To use the Ender Chest, place it anywhere you want and open it. You can place objects in it like you would any other chest.

Obtain an ender pearl. Ender pearls are dropped when you kill Endermen. Endermen are the tall, slender, black mobs. Be careful. Endermen have strong attacks and can disappear and reappear. However, they are afraid of water. Stand in shallow water for safety. Obtain a blaze rod. You can obtain a blaze rod by killing a blaze. Blazes are found in the Nether. If you haven't already done so, gather wood from trees using your fists or an axe, and then open your crafting menu to craft wooden planks from the wood. Finally, craft a crafting table from 4 wooden planks and place it in an accessible location. Craft blaze powder. To craft blaze powder, open the crafting table and then place the blaze rod in the center of the 3x3 crafting grid. Drag the blaze powder into your inventory. Craft an Eye of Ender. To craft an eye of ender, open the crafting table and place the blaze powder in the center of the 3x3 crafting grid. Then place the Ender Pearl in the space to the left. Place 8 blocks of obsidian in each space surrounding the Eye of Ender in the center. Drag the Ender Chest into your inventory. To use the Ender Chest, place it anywhere you want and open it. You can place objects in it like you would any other chest.
